SEARCH
Package com.spaceinvaders.frontend.utils

Class SliderUtils

java.lang.Object
com.spaceinvaders.frontend.utils.SliderUtils
public class SliderUtils extends Object
Utility class for creating and customizing sliders in a LibGDX application. Includes methods for creating sliders with various configurations and attaching value labels.

  • Method Details

    • createSlider

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Slider createSlider(MyAssetManager assetManager, float width, float height, float x, float y)
      Creates a slider with a custom style and specified position and size.
      Parameters:
      assetManager - The asset manager to retrieve textures and resources.
      width - The width of the slider.
      height - The height of the slider.
      x - The x-coordinate position of the slider.
      y - The y-coordinate position of the slider.
      Returns:
      A new Slider instance with the specified style and position.

    • createSlider

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Slider createSlider(MyAssetManager assetManager)
      Creates a slider with a custom style, without specifying position and size.
      Parameters:
      assetManager - The asset manager to retrieve textures and resources.
      Returns:
      A new Slider instance with the specified style.

    • getValueLabel

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Label getValueLabel(MyAssetManager assetManager, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Slider slider, float width, float height, float x, float y)
      Creates a label to display the current value of a slider at a specified position.
      Parameters:
      assetManager - The asset manager to retrieve fonts and resources.
      slider - The slider whose value the label will display.
      width - The width of the slider.
      height - The height of the slider.
      x - The x-coordinate position of the label.
      y - The y-coordinate position of the label.
      Returns:
      A Label instance displaying the slider's value.

    • getValueLabel

      public static com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Label getValueLabel(MyAssetManager assetManager, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Slider slider)
      Creates a label to display the current value of a slider without specifying position.
      Parameters:
      assetManager - The asset manager to retrieve fonts and resources.
      slider - The slider whose value the label will display.
      Returns:
      A Label instance displaying the slider's value.
